attributes.action: Publicly Flog 'ANTI-CAR' and 'Pro-car TRACKING tax' fascists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban people like Cameron Tyre (petitioned FOR 'car tracking tax') and other anti-car fascists from trying to squeeze the life out of ordinary people and help us to 'Free Britain' by publicly flogging them into submission. These people believe 'petrol heads' should be punished for a) using one of man's greatest creations for enjoyment b) commuting to work by car c) travelling on holiday by car etc, I could go on. Not everyone wants to spend each day cultivating tomatoes and lettuce patches as imagine these people do. Not everyone that uses a car is a petrolhead either. (Although I most certainly am!)

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
